block.p: In the largest industrial acquisition ever, General Electric acquired Honeywell International for $45 billion following a whirlwind of dealmaking that was concluded in less than 24 hours. G.E.'s deal with Honeywell broke up an impending merger between Honeywell and United Technologies that was abandoned just as Honeywell's board was planning to vote on that deal.
